Summary: Three bright white lights in triangular shape, suddenly the two outermost zipped into the top one
divs: sighting detailshad come home from work about 8 pm.. working in the horse barn... finishing up the chores, now about 9 or 10pm... walked around the east end of the barn, looked into the north sky and saw three white lights- actually looked just like three bright stars in a triangle- but i had never seen three bright stars in a triangle shape in that part of the sky before.. as i reached for my binoculars (which i was carrying due to the prior months odd sighting)then looked up i saw the two lower-outermost stars just zip into the top bright star or light... and then there was just one bright star\light left in the sky at that spot. i was too frightened to hang around and watch it. finished my chores and went inside.
